original_text:
Then the Lord was jealous for his land
    and took pity on his people.
korean_text: 그 때에 여호와께서 자기의 땅을 극진히 사랑하시어 그의 백성을 불쌍히 여기4)실 것이라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord was jealous for his land
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 주께서 그의 땅을 위해 질투하셨고

sentences.original_text: and took pity on his people
